roleset.name: steer a small ship
roleset.note: SKIPPER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls captain-29.8-1. (from skipper.01-v)

example.name: not a boat
example.text: But spokesmen for both Mr. Isler and Mr. Conner say the formation of the new syndicate has to do with [Mr. Isler]-1's desire [*]-1 to skipper his own team and begin planning now, rather than any falling out between the two sportsmen.
